name: Drunken Sailor (TheColouredMan)
description:
What a night, eh?

You and your crew are celebrating, you just found a huge treasure. The rum is flowing and before you even know it, you wake up in your bed. The memories of last night are a bit blurry, but hey, you got the treasure!

... Wait,  where is it? Maybe the rest of the crew can help, but it seems like they are just as hangover as you.

This is a 2nd semester project for the htk in Hamburg.

Sounds and Music from Epidemic Sound and WeLoveIndies.

Made with FMOD.
